meanings: [명사] compensation, (formal) recompense, (법률) indemnification, [동사] compensate, (formal) recompense, (법률) indemnify
work out a plan for financing one´s obligations

meanings.meaning: claim an offset to the damaged goods

examples.korean: If my baggage is damaged, will you compensate me for it? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 짐이 파손되었을 경우 변상해 주나요? Neungyule
examples.english: If my baggage is damaged, will you compensate me for it? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Will you pay for the damage to my baggage? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 짐이 파손되었을 경우 변상해 주나요? Neungyule
examples.english: Will you pay for the damage to my baggage? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Anyone who has done the damage is under obligation to pay for it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 손상을 입힌 자는 변상할 의무가 있다 Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Anyone who has done the damage is under obligation to pay for it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I will indemnify you for any expenses incurred. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 발생한 비용에 대해서는 내가 변상하겠다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I will indemnify you for any expenses incurred. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The airline paid me for the amount they had overcharged me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 항공회사는 내게 부당하게 요구했던 액수를 변상했다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The airline paid me for the amount they had overcharged me. Add to Wordbook
